Name: LU 561 - Planning, THE ROBESON, Manhattan (C 170050 ZMM)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170050 ZMM, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 561).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Cohen\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 1, 2017 its decision dated February 1, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6a, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate a new mixed-use affordable housing development in the Central Harlem neighborhood of Manhattan, (ULURP No. C 170050 ZMM), Community District 10,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Manhattan \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications C 170051 HAM (L.U. No. 562), an urban development action area project designation and project approval, and disposition of City-owned property; and N 170052 ZRM (L.U. No. 563), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Area;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 7, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the revised negative declaration issued September 2, 2016 (CEQR No. 16HPD078M) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 170050 ZMM, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 6a:\tab\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 1.\tab eliminating from within an R7-2 District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 100 feet westerly of Lenox Avenue - Malcolm X. Boulevard, West 131\super st\nosupersub  Street, a line 90 feet westerly of Lenox Avenue - Malcolm X. Boulevard, and West 130\super th\nosupersub  Street; and \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li360\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an R7-2 District to an R8A District property bounded by a line 90 feet westerly of Lenox Avenue - Malcom X. Boulevard, West 131\super st\nosupersub  Street, Lenox Avenue - Malcolm X. Boulevard, and West 130\super th\nosupersub  Street; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated September 6, 2016, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-377, Community District 10, Borough of Manhattan.  \par
\par
Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on February 15, 2017, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
